    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_25">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">select == "A"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_26" name="Script Task II" pm:scriptRef="27">

    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_27">

    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_28" name="Script Task IV" pm:scriptRef="29">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_24</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>

    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:inclusiveGateway id="node_30" name="Inclusive Gateway" gatewayDirection="Converging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_29</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_32</bpmn:incoming>

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key

scripts.title: First Script TCP4-2252 Verify Inclusive Gateway I
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$date_script = '2021-09-28';
return ['text'=> $text];     
?>

scripts.title: Second Script TCP4-2252 Verify Inclusive Gateway II
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$date_script = '2021-09-28';
return ['text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode];     
?>

scripts.title: Third Script TCP4-2252 Verify Inclusive Gateway III
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$date_script = '2021-09-28';
return ['nested_date_picker'=> $date_script];     
?>

scripts.title: Fourth Script TCP4-2252 Verify Inclusive Gateway IV
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$date_script = '2021-09-28';
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode, 'nested_date_picker'=> $date_script];     
?>
